title: Textile, "Length of Block Printed Linen", 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen "cretonne". Alternating rows of small curling brown branches with red and brown flowers with blue and green leaves. Vertically twining thin grey serpentine vines separates individual branches. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Length of Block Printed Linen", 1920–30.
1920–30. printed linen. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-50.
